info.title: AzureDataManagementClient
info.description: The AzureData management API provides a RESTful set of web APIs to manage Azure Data Resources.

get.summary: List sqlManagedInstance resources in the subscription

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 InvalidParameterValue - An invalid value was given to parameter.

 * 400 InvalidCrossSubscriptionVmMove - Invalid cross subscription move of resource.

 * 404 ResourceNotFound - The requested resource was not found.

get.description: Gets all sqlManagedInstances in a resource group.
get.summary: List sqlManagedInstance resources in the resource group

get.description: Retrieves a SQL Managed Instance resource

put.description: Creates or replaces a SQL Managed Instance resource

parameters.name: sqlManagedInstanceName
parameters.description: The name of SQL Managed Instances

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The SQL Managed Instance to be created or updated.

delete.description: Deletes a SQL Managed Instance resource

parameters.name: sqlManagedInstanceName
parameters.description: The name of Sql Managed Instances

200.description: Successfully deleted the SQL Managed Instance.

204.description: The specified SQL Managed Instance does not exist.

patch.description: Updates a SQL Managed Instance resource

get.summary: List dataController resources in the subscription
List dataController resources in the resource group

put.description: Creates or replaces a dataController resource

204.description: The specified DataController does not exist.

Sku.description: The resource model definition representing SKU

name.description: The name of the SKU. Ex - P3. It is typically a letter+number code

tier.description: This field is required to be implemented by the Resource Provider if the service has more than one tier, but is not required on a PUT.

size.description: The SKU size. When the name field is the combination of tier and some other value, this would be the standalone code.

family.description: If the service has different generations of hardware, for the same SKU, then that can be captured here.

capacity.description: If the SKU supports scale out/in then the capacity integer should be included. If scale out/in is not possible for the resource this may be omitted.

principalId.description: The principal ID of resource identity.

name.description: A user defined name of the 3rd Party Artifact that is being procured.

publisher.description: The publisher of the 3rd Party Artifact that is being bought. E.g. NewRelic

product.description: The 3rd Party artifact that is being procured. E.g. NewRelic. Product maps to the OfferID specified for the artifact at the time of Data Market onboarding.

promotionCode.description: A publisher provided promotion code as provisioned in Data Market for the said product/artifact.

version.description: The version of the desired product/artifact.

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.description: The type of the resource. Ex- Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines or Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts.

TrackedResource.description: The resource model definition for a ARM tracked top level resource

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

ProxyResource.description: The resource model definition for a ARM proxy resource. It will have everything other than required location and tags

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

DataControllerUpdate.description: Used for updating a data controller resource.

createdBy.description: An identifier for the identity that created the resource

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource

lastModifiedBy.description: An identifier for the identity that last modified the resource

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

IdentityType.description: The type of identity that creates/modifies resources

OnPremiseProperty.description: Properties from the on premise data controller

id.description: A globally unique ID identifying the associated on premise cluster

publicSigningKey.description: Certificate that contains the on premise cluster public key used to verify signing

signingCertificateThumbprint.description: Unique thumbprint returned to customer to verify the certificate being uploaded

PostgresInstanceUpdate.description: An update to a Postgres Instance.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

SqlManagedInstanceUpdate.description: An update to a SQL Managed Instance.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

containerResourceId.description: ARM Resource id of the container resource (Azure Arc for Servers)

createTime.description: The time when the resource was created.

updateTime.description: The time when the resource was last updated.

vCore.description: The number of logical processors used by the SQL Server instance.

SqlServerInstanceUpdate.description: An update to a SQL Server Instance.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

CloudError.description: An error response from the Azure Data service.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

target.description: The target of the particular error. For example, the name of the property in error.

details.description: A list of additional details about the error.

CloudErrorBody.description: An error response from the Batch service.

target.description: The target of the error (for example, the name of the property in error).

subscriptionId.name: subscriptionId
subscriptionId.description: The ID of the Azure subscription

resourceGroupName.name: resourceGroupName
resourceGroupName.description: The name of the Azure resource group

location.name: location
location.description: The Azure region to use for the request

apiVersion.name: api-version
apiVersion.description: The API version to use for the request

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: API version to use for the request.

ResourceGroupParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupParameter.description: Name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.
